channel.title: [317] Luzox-Remastered (PK Base, Cleaned)
channel.description:
[CENTER][B]Luzox Remastered[/B]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OU3wDwi.png[/img]
If you aren't familiar with Luzox here is the rundown: [B]- 317 Revision - Oldschool server - 2010 weaponry (chaotics/claws/godswords) - PKing base. Set stats, spawnable runes, etc[/B]
Took the LuzoxPK 2012 base and [U]cleaned [/U][B]everything [/B]from head to toe. Fixed every [I]dupe [/I]within it as well as [I]deadlocks [/I]and [I]gamebreakers[/I].
[SPOILER=Game Enhancing Features] [LEFT]- Clean bank interface with deposit button. - Proper packet handling (None of that instant switch that causes dcs shit) - Crisp new shop interface - All text refurbished. No more broken english all over the place. - Item/NPC rarity/special colors given a new refreshing look. - New message box system to display pkpoints gained/kill feed info/whatever the f**k you want. - Better data sending and fixed unhandled packets meaning absolutely zero T1 and T2 errors as well as freezes. - Enter to login - Scrolling on interfaces & More[/LEFT][/SPOILER]
[B]Fixed and Finished unstarted Content[/B]
[SPOILER=Fixed Content] [LEFT]- Bakriminel Bolts - Dragon Bolts - Diamond Bolts - Vengeance - Saradomin Sword Special Attack - Granite Maul Special Attack - Dragonfire Shield operate - Shadow-silk hood - Void Ranged bonus - Void Mage bonus - Magic potion damage boost - Arcane stream/Staff of light/etc magic boost - Correct formulas - Correct Divine and Elysian effects & More[/LEFT] [/SPOILER]
[B]Media[/B]
[SPOILER=Media] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3s1AN5A.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/yFWAJAm.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Y68kQjA.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/DAjbwm0.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/KNoXNdK.png[/img] [/SPOILER]
[B][URL=http://"https://www.dropbox.com/s/237mm8000fmck3z/Luzox%20Remastered.rar?dl=0"]Download[/URL][/B] [/CENTER]

If you aren’t familiar with Luzox here is the rundown:
